pr_title: Changing dependency from python3-distutils to python3-distutils-extra

timeline.message: Changing dependency from python3-distutils to python3-distutils-extra

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Depends: ${misc:Depends}, ${python3:Depends}, genisoimage, nfs-common, python3-pip, python3-distutils-extra, python3-netaddr
          
          
            
            Depends: ${misc:Depends}, ${python3:Depends}, genisoimage, nfs-common, python3-pip, python3-distutils | python3-distutils-extra, python3-netaddr
          
      
    
    
  

@davidjumani will this affect other Ubuntu releases? Saw this other PR, not sure if adding pipe will work here
timeline.author: shwstppr
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -9,7 +9,7 @@ Homepage: http://www.cloudstack.org/
 
 Package: cloudstack-common
 Architecture: all
-Depends: ${misc:Depends}, ${python3:Depends}, genisoimage, nfs-common, python3-pip, python3-distutils, python3-netaddr
+Depends: ${misc:Depends}, ${python3:Depends}, genisoimage, nfs-common, python3-pip, python3-distutils-extra, python3-netaddr

replies.bodyText: @shwstppr Thanks. I can test with these changes. Am currently running tests on Ubuntu 18 to check if everything works fine!
replies.author: davidjumani
